sn48.49:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kosambiyam viharati ghositarame.
sn48.49:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasmata pindolabharadvajena anna byakata hoti:
sn48.49:1.4: “khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami”ti.
sn48.49:1.5: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn48.49:2.2: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanamiti.
sn48.49:2.3: Kim nu kho, bhante, atthavasam sampassamanena ayasmata pindolabharadvajena anna byakata:
sn48.49:2.4: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanami”ti?
sn48.49:3.1: “Tinnannam kho, bhikkhave, indriyanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta pindolabharadvajena bhikkhuna anna byakata:
sn48.49:3.2: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanamiti.
sn48.49:3.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnannam indriyanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta pindolabharadvajena bhikkhuna anna byakata:
sn48.49:3.6: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanamiti.
sn48.49:3.11: ‘Jatijaramaranam khayan’ti kho, bhikkhave, sampassamanena pindolabharadvajena bhikkhuna anna byakata:
sn48.49:3.12: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanami”ti.
